title: Quotes
text: Gathering qoutes that I come across

title: Quotes
text:
2025

Funny thing about getting older your eyesight starts to get weaker but your ability to see through people’s bullshit gets better. - Anonymous
Agents are not only going to change how everyone interacts with computers. They’re also going to upend the software industry, bringing about the biggest revolution in computing since we went from typing commands to tapping on icons. - Bill Gates, Co-founder of Microsoft
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand. – Martin Fowler
In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order. – Carl Jung

title: Quotes
text:
2024

When you focus on you, you grow. When you focus on shit, shit grows - Dwayne Johnson
People do not decide their futures, they decide their habits and their habits decide their futures - F. M. Alexander
Watch your thoughts, they become your words; watch your words, they become your actions; watch your actions, they become your habits; watch your habits, they become your character; watch your character, it becomes your destiny. - Lao Tzu
Travel and tell no one, live a true love story and tell no one, live happily and tell no one, people ruin beautiful things. - Kahlil Gibran
If you spend your time chasing butterflies, they’ll fly away. But if you spend your time making a beautiful garden, the butterflies will come. Don’t chase, attract. - Japanese proverb
It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows. - Epictetus
work is fun and fun is work
When you start taking care of yourself, you start feeling better, you start looking better, and you even start to attract better. It all starts with you. - Anonymous
It may seem difficult at first, but everything is difficult at first. - Miyamoto Musashi
Everything we hear is an opinion not a fact, everything we see is a perspective not the truth. - Marcus Aurelius
Master the mind or you will be a slave to your thoughts
Train your mind. Train your body. Trust in the force - Asoka Tano
You earn a living to Live Well not to kill yourself with stress - Sadhguru
When words become unclear, I shall focus with photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence. - Ansel Adams
The happiness of your life depends on the quality of your thought - Marcus Aurelius
Death is sinking into slumbers deep. Birth again is waking out of sleep - Thirukkural
The gap between your current life and the life you want is called Focus - Anonymous
Every positive thought has a negative thought associated with it. - Anonymous
Desire to learn is incredibly scarce in this world. Naval Revikant
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most - Abraham Lincoln
What get measured get managed
Behaviour is always greater than knowledge. Because in life there are many situations where knowledge fails but Behaviour can still handle - A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
We live in the time of cutting edge obsolescence - John Finger
The idea of progress is built on the notion that if we admit our ignorance and invest resources in research, things can improve. - Yuval Noah Harari

the progress depends on recognizing our lack of knowledge and actively investing in research to address it. By acknowledging what we do not know and dedicating resources to learn and innovate, we can achieve improvements and advancements.

Edison did not look for problems in need for solutions; he looked for solutions in need for modifications - The New Yorker
The man who blames other has a long journey ahead, the man who blames himelf is halfway there, and the man who blames no one has already arived - Chineese proverb
If you don’t ask the right questions, you don’t get the right answers. - Robert Half
Worrying doesn’t take away tomorrow’s troubles. It takes away today’s peace. - Annonymous
I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma … a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interrupt as though it had an underlying truth. - Umberto Eco
Life is too short to hangout with people who aren’t resourceful. - Jeff Bezos
The prompt is the fundamental unit of knowledge work. - @IndyDevDan

title: Roshan Padmanabhan
text:
I’m a senior scientist, working at Trailhead Biosystems Inc. In my current role as the director of informatics, I sphearhead THB’s the bioinformatics wing where we work on implementing cutting edge transcriptomics technologies, quality control of our products, next generation sequencing pipelines and workflows.
I am passionate about AI and ML and its applications and use in biology and medicine.
I previously worked as a bioinformatics scientist at Dr. Mukesh Jain’s lab, bioinformatics postdoc fellow at Dr. Charis Eng’s lab, bioinformatics engineer at Remy Burcelin’s lab.

On this site I keep a list of - publications - CV - Resume - Blog - Some Quotes that resonate




Comprehensive germline genomic profiles of children, adolescents and young adults with solid tumors link
Sankey Plots Visualization showing drug–target network analysis in children, adolescents, and young adults (C-AYA) with solid tumors. link
MAGI: A pipeline for whole genome comparison. link
ARG-ANNOT (Antibiotic Resistance Gene-ANNOTation)link
